title: Dainel73
author: Dainel73
content: These titles are needed for our startup:- Crypto marketing manager- Web 3 marketing manager- Community manageryou can visit our website : https://hourlylotto.io/don't hesitate to ask questions about the project

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Are you trying to spam the forum with your links? Seems like you are. I can see you have created useless topic in the bounty section people which doesn’t make any sense to be honest. Please stop spamming, rather try to get the best from the forum with following rules. There are a lot of ways to do that.What's your telegram?

comments.author: Dainel73
comments.body: How could it even be a spam? I'm trying to find a person who can help us in these fieldsAnd if you check the so called spam link you can find our Telegram ID on the web page stop bullying newbies here Which rule did I break ?

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: You can check out @igehhh campaign management, maybe his services as a crypto marketing manager and community management is what you need.find his service thread here ~ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400145.0

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Dainel73 on August 26, 2022, 02:06:22 AMHow could it even be a spam? I'm trying to find a person who can help us in these fieldsAnd if you check the so called spam link you can find our Telegram ID on the web page stop bullying newbies here Which rule did I break ?The telegram link on your website is not existing when the I click the link. Littlemouse basis on his spam accusation is because your post contains few details about job you are offering. You should indicate the complete job description, hours of working, salary rate and other details related to the job to save time on asking it on the thread. You should add too any social media links on your thread that will make the conversation faster like your telegram account.Many user here posting job offers here that has incomplete info and most of them are just spamming. if you are really interested on finding applicants here, You should make your job hiring thread complete.
